mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.name AS "name", a.phone AS "phone", a.type AS "type", a.sex AS "sex", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.id_card_attach AS "idCardAttach", a.address AS "address", a.org_code AS "orgCode", a.org_code_attach AS "orgCodeAttach", a.status AS "status", a.remarks AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yyb_member( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, name, phone, type, sex, id_card, id_card_attach, address, org_code, org_code_attach, status, remarks, password ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{type}, #{sex}, #{idCard}, #{idCardAttach}, #{address}, #{orgCode}, #{orgCodeAttach}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{password} )
mapper.update: UPDATE yyb_member SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, type = #{type}, sex = #{sex}, id_card = #{idCard}, id_card_attach = #{idCardAttach}, address = #{address}, org_code = #{orgCode}, org_code_attach = #{orgCodeAttach}, status = #{status}, remarks = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * FROM yyb_member where name = #{loginName} or phone = #{loginName}
